pkgmetadata.longdescription: Steady and Unsteady Open-Channel Flow Computation // A tool for undergraduate and graduate courses in open-channel hydraulics. Provides functions for computing normal and critical depths, steady-state water surface profiles (e.g. backwater curves) and unsteady flow computations (e.g. flood wave routing) as described in Koohafkan MC, Younis BA (2015). "Open-channel computation with R." The R Journal, 7(2), 249262. doi: 10.32614/RJ-2015-034.
